full_summary:
================================
### Tender Notice: Cancelled

#### Contract Details

* **Solicitation Number**: EB129-230099/A
* **Reference Number**: PW_HAL_417_11572
* **Date of Publication**: 2022-09-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-29T13:00:00

#### Contract Status

* **Status**: Cancelled

#### Overview

This tender notice has been withdrawn. It was originally intended to procure [cabinets, lockers, bins, and shelving](gsinDescription_nibsDescription-eng.md) under the [Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)](#). The scope of the procurement was to cover the entire province of [Nova Scotia](regionsOfDelivery-regionsLivraison-eng.md).

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Justin Clow
* **Email**: [justin.clow@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:justin.clow@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (902) 111-1111
* **Fax**: (902) 496-5016
* **Address**: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, Nova Scotia, B3J 1T3

#### Procurement Category

* **Category**: Goods
* **Trade Agreements**: The tender was open to bidders from countries that have signed trade agreements with Canada, including CETA, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

Note that the constituent parts of the text have been segmented using the corresponding keys to make it easier to understand and read. The "C" values relate to the "key" column in the orphaned Excel file mentioned above. The expanded list of possible goods and services, listed in the product Receipt is below.
